It's the opposite of Conan O'Brien 's setup at NBC, says Jeffrey Ross , a partner in the company. Conaco owns the show, and TBS is a participant. At Tonight, NBC owned the show, and we were participants. And ownership makes all the difference for Conan O'Brien and his team.
